member.name: M:Shimterface.Internal.TypeHelpers.IsEquivalentGenericMethodType(System.Type,System.Type)
member.summary: Compares for equivalence of types as used in a generic method. Does not compare any part of the generic attributes.

member.returns: True if the types can be considered equivalent
